deploy.startCommand: echo 'Starting migrations...' && python manage.py migrate --settings=pangcah_accounting.settings.railway && echo 'Migrations complete. Collecting static files...' && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --settings=pangcah_accounting.settings.railway && echo 'Static files collected.
